title: Mixed Media and Advert Desinger
description: For numerous groups around campus, professional individuals, and organizations I've designed everything from logos, tshirts and flyers to posters, bus advertisements and even a childrens' book.

title: Mobile Application Designer
description: For a User-Centered Design class, I was tasked with designing a full mobile app, 'EZList' to help users save money on their grocery shopping runs.  All illustrations, icons, and user interface elements I personally made in Adobe Illustrator.
